Build roads, conveyor belts and other systems to transport items more efficiently. Research and unlock new technologies to expand your ever growing industrial machine.

Defend your village against the monster horde or disable this feature and build in peace.

name: Tile Cities
description:
Tile Cities breaks city building down to its very basics making it more of a simple puzzle.
Compose nice-looking city maps of randomly generated city blocks (tiles), match colored buildings and parks to meet demand, connect tram lines with depots to get bonuses.
Creative mode with no limitations is also available. In this mode you can regenerate random tile until you get the one you like.

name: Kingdom Maker
description: Kingdom Maker is a massive multiplayer strategy game with only one rule... yours!

name: Wingspan: European Expansion
description: The Golden Geek Awards-winning expansion to Wingspan, a beautiful, relaxing board game for 1-5 players. Enjoy original gameplay features and attract new extraordinary birds to your network of wildlife preserves.

name: Galagi Shooter
description: Galagi Shooter is based on the old school arcade hit space defender game, probably one of the best game ever made. Highly playable, action-packed, this game include many aliens waves to defeat and power ups to collect.

name: Sanctum Breach: Rebirth
description: A vast ocean of uncertainty clouds your past, present and future. Venture forth as you struggle to find your place in the world, a Nomad, wandering from village to village attempting to unravel the mysteries of your place here in Petura. An Endgame focused ARPG full of customisation, loot and more!

name: Tearstone: Thieves of the Heart
description: The Heart of Tearstone has gone missing! Climb aboard and hold on tight for a challenging and enchanting Puzzle Adventure game for the ages!

name: Poppy Playtime: Chapter 2 - Fly in a Web
description: Three times the size of Chapter 1, you must descend deeper into the toy factory. Mind-numbing puzzles and horrific toys await. Grapple and swing your way to safety. Try to escape- and don't let Mommy find you.

name: RiffTrax: The Game
description: RiffTrax: The Game is a multiplayer party game where players compete to make bad movies funny. Do you have what it takes to be the next movie riffing genius? Grab your friends and make fun of some of the worst cinematic abominations ever created.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Chaos Gate - Daemonhunters: Castellan Champion Edition
description: The Castellan Champion Edition includes Warhammer 40,000: Chaos Gate - Daemonhunters, the Original Soundtrack, and the unique playable character Castellan Garran Crowe.

name: Life of a Space Force Captain
description: Live a full life in the future as a human, an alien, or even a robot as you rise through the ranks to become captain of your very own starship.

name: Sky Caravan
description: Welcome to the Skyways, caravaneer. Complete missions, manage your ship’s resources and make tough decisions to keep your crew alive and happy. Or not. Choices have lasting consequences in this Text-Based RPG. You are the captain - and the clouds are waiting!

name: The Hike
description: The Hike is a first person horror/puzzle game in which you must push through the horrors that start in the much feared forests of the Mount Grandious National Park. Use your skills to make it back to society... and use your legs, you're no fighter.

name: How to Sing to Open Your Heart: Remastered
description: The cute fantasy visual novel, "How to Sing to Open Your Heart" returns as a remastered version. Princess Myana, who loves to sing, finally comes to Eroolia. A lot of people, like the Imperial Guard Captain, Ludovic, and Princess Anna, are unhappy about it. What will happen?

name: Yaengard
description: Yaengard is a tabletop-like strategic RPG, bringing the excitement of dice-RPGs into a digital roguelike adventure. Evolve your party of villagers into heroes through challenging decisions & forged personalities. Combine abilities, equipment, and character traits into something truly powerful.

name: SCP Strategy
description: Take control of the SCP Foundation. For the general good, find, contain, and protect SCP objects. Develop your foundation and protect it from hostile organizations, in the last resort destroy them and capture SCP objects held there.

name: Society's Paradigms
description: Society’s Paradigms is an action-packed social commentary based on the innovative combination of Rogue-lite and RPG elements. Explore a randomly generated world to obtain new skills and abilities. Experiment and combine passive and active skills to achieve insane combos and satisfying combat.

name: Citizen Sleeper
description: Roleplaying in the ruins of interplanetary capitalism. Live the life of an escaped worker, washed-up on a lawless station at the edge of an interstellar society. Inspired by the flexibility and freedom of TTRPGs, explore the station, choose your friends, escape your past and change your future.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Chaos Gate - Daemonhunters
description: Lead humanity's greatest weapon, the Grey Knights, in this fast-paced turn-based tactical RPG. Root out and purge a galaxy-spanning plague in a cinematic, story-driven campaign, using the tactics and talents of your own personalised squad of Daemonhunters.

name: Trek to Yomi
description: As a vow to his dying Master, the young swordsman Hiroki is sworn to protect his town and the people he loves against all threats. Faced with tragedy and bound to duty, the lone samurai must voyage beyond life and death to confront himself and decide his path forward.

name: King and Kingdoms
description: Factions, countries and empires that have truly existed in the real history await you. The only difference is that it is in your hand to rewrite their history. Become the ruler of any country you want and lead your nation from small village to the way to be the magnificent empire!

name: The Inheritance of Crimson Manor
description: Explore a beautiful and Enigmatic Victorian Manor with a dark secret, In this narrative horror first person exploration puzzle game filled with fine art, secret passages and mysterious mechanical puzzles playing as the executor of the last will from the enigmatic Railroad Magnate Hadley Strangre.

name: Line War
description:
Inspired by classic RTS titles like Command & Conquer with a nod to famed board game Axis & Allies, Line War combines elements of 4X, wargame, and real-time tactics genres into a unique strategic experience for veterans and newcomers.

This game has a never-before-seen approach that lets you focus on drawing commands and executing a strategy rather than managing individual units. Chain commands and execute orchestrated operations for coordinated attacks against your opponent. This command system sets Line War apart from other strategy

name: Maeve's Academy
description: Maeve's Academy is a sandbox-style visual novel game in which players assume the role of the the first man to step into the magical realm, attending H.G. Academy alongside his childhood best friend.

name: Rally One: Race to Glory
description:
Accept the challenge of rally apocalypse!

Rally One is a full-featured racing game for mobile gamers. It features an easy-to-understand interface, a physics system improved based on user feedback, and well-optimized graphics.

In Rally One, you can participate in championships with powerful cars in exotic locations, race against people from around the world, and test your speed, maneuverability, and drift skills in special events.

name: Artistic Girl 1
description: Relaxing puzzle game, artistic photo beauty, let you have a good mood.

name: RV Park Life
description: RV Park Life is a management game where players can expand the size of their camp by building recreational areas, improving facilities, managing staff, and setting up monetization mechanisms for each area. We hope that players can immerse themselves in nature like a real camper in this game, and at the same time gain a sense of growth and achievement, let them become the managers of the campsite, and let every camper have a pleasant Accommodation experience.

name: Erase Box
description: Aim for the goal by placing and erasing blocks with the mouse!

name: Hunt3r
description: Humanity has settled its first Jupiter-lunar colony. Rhonda is on the run after stealing a powerful political symbol. The Enforcers have sent a Hunter - a ferocious, relentless cyborg with whom Rhonda has a history - named Diarmuid to track her. That is, until the alien Guardian appears on the horizon. For the symbol in question is no a mere item. It needs to be returned to its resting place, before it is too late. Thief and Enforcer must now work together to save the colony.

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga - Trooper Pack
description: Play as the soldiers of the Empire from Rogue One: A Star Wars Story, Solo: A Star Wars Story, and The Mandalorian. - Imperial Death Trooper - Incinerator Stormtrooper - Range Trooper - Imperial Shoretrooper - Mimban Stormtrooper

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga - The Mandalorian: Season 2 - Character Pack
description: Get into more action with the fan-favorite characters from Season 2 of the hit series "The Mandalorian." Play as Ahsoka Tano, Anakin Skywalker's former padawan with her dual lightsabers, and Boba Fett with his recovered armor.

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga - The Bad Batch Character Pack
description: Be a clone unlike any other. The elite Clone Force 99, also known as The Bad Batch, each have their own exceptional skills making them a formidable crew. The character pack includes: - Hunter - Echo - Wrecker - Tech - Crosshair

name: Nocturia
description: You slept over at a friends house. But now you are awake. And it's early. Like really early. Also you need to pee. So get up and find a toilet without waking anyone!

name: Endless Nightmare: Shrine
description: Endless Nightmare: Shrine is a free 3D horror game, and it's the third entry of the Endless Nightmare series. Different from the previous two horror games, scary shrine owns a bigger map, and more types of technology weapons. In this horror game, action and shooting is still a feature. In addition to long-range shooting, you can also fight against creepy monsters in close quarters; the ultimate battle with bosses enriches the fun of the horror shooting game; new survival skills have also been added to the epic game, which greatly improves the chances of survival! Exquisite 3D art style, well-designed puzzles, terrifying unknown monsters, fierce fighting in the creepy rooms, satisfy all your fantasy of creepy horror games! Experience this free horror game, embark on a creepy adventure to find the Heart of Pharaoh, overcome difficulties, meet new challenges and survive in the scary shrine!

name: Golf Club Wasteland / Aspire Ina's Tale Bundle
description: Whether through art or storytelling, some games have something special that transport you directly into their worlds.

name: Outbreak Diamond Collection
description: Experience six terrifying survival horror adventures in the Outbreak Diamond Collection.

name: Dungeon Quest
description: Dungeon Quest is a simple dungeon crawler game inspired by the Princess Quest minigames from FNAF Security Breach.

name: Alcyone
description: Alcyone is a Science Fiction 3D First Person Shooter (FPS) Video Game set in an Open World mid-crisis New York City (NYC) that can be freely explored by the players.

name: La Jetée
description: ‘This is the story of a man marked by an image from his childhood.’ An 30minute black noire game, with an deep story, 30 beautiful images and stunning backroundsound.

name: CarX Drift Racing Online: Hit the Wall
description: Have you ever thought how much damage your car can take?

name: Underliner
description: An unusual combination of lollipops and bullets invites you to a world full of surprises.

name: The Revenge of Mr.Samuel
description: Samuel! The name of the dark evil master god of a distance universe created by himself. 4 fellas felt to this dimension by a huge mistake made by Huseyin –our hero. Help these 4 fellas to return home safely and defeat Samuel if you can!

name: MITS: Monsters in the Shadows
description: Low-poly horror fps survival shooter game. Kill monsters hidden within the walls of an abandoned city.

name: Magi: Mind Game
description: Magi: Mind Game takes the essential elements of a fighting game and turns it into an easy to learn difficult to master turn based strategy game. Focus on manipulating and predicting to outsmart your opponent. No need to memorize combos and difficult controls.

name: Cat Powered UFO
description: Cat Powered UFO is a blend of turn-based RPG combat and old-school Zelda top-down action. Collect cats, visit crazy dimensions, and be a jerk to NPCs. Find combos of "Illegal bonuses" to break the combat system! Cat Powered UFO is a quirky and light-hearted game with a self-aware sense of humor.

name: Satan's Puzzle 2
description: A continuation of Satan's Puzzle 666 game, this is a puzzle game where you have to match magic circles pieces and get an evil spirit

name: 星际神格
description: A turn-based story-adventure sci-fi role-playing game. It's not big, the player's operation is very simple, just watch the plot, operate the movement and quickly select it in the battle interface. There are some simple side differences, and the overall exploration is up to two hours.

name: Runnyk
description: A 2D mini action RPG game about a viking and magic rune powers.

name: Dungeon Reels Tactics
description: Dungeon Reels Tactics is a challenging party based RPG roguelike with Slot Machine based Combat. Your party members' unique slot machine will supply your abilities each turn. Make the best decisions to succeed in Battle. Lose party members, recruit new ones, and try to reach The "Great Evil".

name: Cubes and Knights
description: You are strong and huge, you have a heavy sword in your hands, and somewhere deep an ancient evil is hidden. The King himself sent you on a difficult campaign: to find the immortal enemy of all people. Find ancient artifacts and work your way through the labyrinths with steel and magic.

name: Pair of Aces
description: Bomb's Away! Sink the enemy fleet or pair up with a friend for double the damage ... or take them on face-to-face and try to sink their carrier before they sink yours!

name: Wildcat Gun Machine
description: Wildcat Gun Machine is a bullet hell dungeon crawler where you take on hordes of disgusting flesh beasts with a wide variety of guns, giant mech robots, and cute kittens.

name: Race! Make 'm finish...
description: There is a Race going to start. The only thing is, you are not part of that Race, as you are the Race Track Engineer. You need to make sure that the Race can take place, and you have a Car that that has different tools or add-ons you pickup while driving. As you drive around the Race Tracks you come across different obstacles that need to be cleared or you encounter stuck Racers that need to be given an extra push.

name: Dinosaur Fossil Hunter
description: Become a real paleontologist, explore various environments and search for dinosaur fossils. Dig for and study the remnants of these majestic creatures to learn about their evolution. Build your own museum and experience an immersive background story.

name: Mystical Crash in Magical Middle Ages: Adventure of Valkyrie
description:
A guy named Dimon, the main character of this game, inexplicably got into the magical Middle Ages and was forced to disguise himself as a valkyrie - a warrior girl Diana). What awaits him, will he be able to understand what happened, return home or stay in the magical world. Is he still he, or maybe she, or something else?

What adventures are waiting for the character? All or almost all actions and their consequences depend on the player.

name: Amazing Penguin DX
description: Another DMG classic joins the DX colorization crew! Enjoy this Natsume’s little addictive gem now in full color for the first time!

name: Shallow World
description: A "reimagination" of Doom 2 episode 1 (11 maps). + 2 early/reused maps

name: The House of Rats
description: The House of Rats is a short horror game based on the work of the same name by H.P. Lovecraft.

name: Friday Night Funkin': Hazy River
description: Hazy River is a mod created by atsuover and Rageminer, and as the GameBanana page says: "2 classic FNF Mods in 1 sexy(?) package!", merging Garcello and Annie into one remake mod. It counts with: remastered songs; previously unused assets; minor updates and new bonus content.

name: Stellaris: Console Edition - Nemesis
description: Nemesis is an expansion to Stellaris in which you will be able to determine the fate of a destabilizing galaxy. Adding espionage tools, a path to power as the Galactic Custodian - or the Menace option to become the crisis - Nemesis gives you the most powerful tools ever available in Stellaris.

name: House Party: Halloween Holiday Pack
description: Enjoy spine-chilling seasonal decorations, sinister costumes, creepy critters, and more in House Party's petrifying free Halloween holiday pack. Keep an eye out for ongoing spooky season updates!

name: War Thunder: "Wings of Victory" Bundle
War Thunder: "Weapons of Victory" Bundle
War Thunder: "Tracks of Victory" Bundle
The Stick and the Basket
description: A short and contemplative promenade inspired by Ursula K. Le Guin's Carrier Bag Theory of Fiction

name: Shop of Things
description:
On a gloomy afternoon, a sudden burst of rain sends you under a shop's roof.

But was it just bad weather, or did someone (or some...thing) want you under this very roof in this very moment?

Find out, by stepping into the Shop of Things!

name: Pickle Clicker
description: Click pickle, get pickle, spend pickle, get more pickle.

name: Everlast
description:
Thank you for choosing Everlast - where death is just a new beginning. Get ready to enter a playground full of infinite options for your digitized mind. We're honored that you've chosen to store your consciousness with us. Because you deserve an afterlife full of possibility. Your account activation will begin shortly. Restriction may apply. Afterlife membership tier eligibility is contingent on past behavior in digital spaces. Welcome!

Everlast is an FMV game in which you play as a recently-deceased person being onboarded to a new virtual existence. All the characters in the game were generated using artificial intelligence.

name: Backstage
description: A point-and-click search for clues behind the curtains. Will you piece together an idol's mysterious musical cover-up?

name: Sheeplings
description: With 'Sheeplings' children can discover the use of mobile devices and their possibilities in a gentle way. The app lets children experience a day of a lamb and its mother in a blooming meadow. There are no rules, goals or tasks. When children engage with the digital device for the first time, they can observe the lovingly designed and animated animals. Simple touch gestures can then be used to discover the interactivity of the game: The sheep follow the finger or can be stroked. A technically sophisticated simulation makes it a lot of fun to stroke the grass with your fingers. And children who have already tried out the app loved making the colorful flowers literally sound. The playful and self-directed experience is not disturbed by any menus. At the beginning, the game explains to parents how to prevent accidental switching to other apps. The duration of the game can also be set here. After the time has expired, the day comes to an end with a sunset. When the sheep lies down to sleep, the interaction options end and the game comes to an end.

name: Crypto Unicorns
description: A unicorn pet-collecting and farming game built on blockchain by Laguna Games.

name: Relic Hunters: Rebels
description:
Shoot and dash through colorful levels while crafting and upgrading dozens of weapons. Defeat the Ducan Empire and bring peace to a divided planet.
This offline shooter/looter/RPG is chock-full of beautiful chaos — and offers an intriguing story.
The Hunters cross paths with Baru, a young leader on a planet inhabited by four warring Tribes. Our heroes must put their differences aside to help their new friends fight off the Ducan Empire and reclaim the all-powerful Void Stone.
Battle enemies, and get blueprints, materials and resources. Use that loot to craft amazing guns — or improve the ones you already have. Customize your guns by upping the firing rate, adding projectiles and much more!
Unlock and play as four different Hunters with unique stats and abilities: the shooter Jimmy; the rogue donkey Ace; the warrior Pinkyy; or the cool Raff!

name: WRC Collection Vol. 2
description: Relive the 2019, 2020 and 2021 seasons with a bundle that includes WRC 8, WRC 9 and WRC 10 - the most official rally experience possible.

name: Grid Miner
description: Grid Miner is a real-time strategy puzzle game where you mine asteroids to gather resources and expand your space station. Unlock new tools and utilities as you progress through levels. Maintain your quotas and learn more about your employer and coworkers at Hypergo Industries.

name: Disharmonia
description: Disharmonia is a first person exploration game. Your decision will play a big role in the development of the whole game. You will play as Tony, you will explore and discover special places beyond your reality. You will try to find an end, but the game will never end.

name: Abyss King
description: The abyss In the bottomless dark abyss, Xiao Wei lights up the lights, attracting the attention of the surrounding creatures, and the sound of footsteps approaching quickly to support this luminous object , light the path, and work together to find the way out of the abyss..

name: Miner of Minerals
description: In the exciting game "Miner of minerals" you play as a miner and your task is to dig up as many gems as possible to earn a lot of money. Upgrade your equipment and try to set a record for mining minerals every time!

name: 2Week: Death World
description: The world was filled with darkness. Gather supplies and people, build a wall, and defend yourself against the emissaries of the underworld! 2Week:DeathWorld is a side-scrolling strategy game drawn in dots.

name: The Cleaner
description: The Cleaner is a hardcore die 'n' retry inspired by John Wick, Hotline Miami and SuperHot. You control a highly-trained " cleaner " with a unique power. No cliché storyline, no cutscenes, start the game and play.

name: Adios Amigos: Galactic Explorers
description: Team up with your friends & family and explore the peculiar universe of ADIOS Amigos. A game with serious astrophysics in a comic setting for 1-4 players. Explore solar systems and discover planets, space stations, aliens, and artifacts. Improvise fuel efficient trajectories to keep your rusty ship running (and you might see your home planet once again). Toy with accurate and delightful space physics. Break into a space station with an asteroid. Tow a sofa into a black hole. Normal stuff.

name: Pizza Synthwave
description: A fast paced parkour game where you have to get to the pizza at the end of each level using your speed, quick reflexes and abilities. Wall run, jump, climb, use your grappling hook to get the fastest time! Set in a gorgeous neon world. For fans of titles such as Mirror's Edge, Hot Lava and Karlson.

name: Yokai Hunter Shintaro
description: Yokai Hunter Shintaro presents the adventures of two heroes on a quest to restore balance between the human world and the Yokai kingdom. It will be your mission to kill the different bosses of each stage to restore order.

name: Farmer Toon
description: In Farmer Toon, you play a farmer who inherits a farm. You can harvest crops, raise animals and cook food. Trade with other players online to get richer ! Choose your specialty from 3 professions. Relax in the city centre with your friends online !

name: Halo Infinite: Season 2 - Lone Wolves
description: Lone Wolves, gear up for Season 2 of Halo Infinite! Experience fresh content including new maps, modes, themed limited-time events, and an all-new Battle Pass that never expires.

name: Ninja Noboken
description: Ninja Noboken is a 2.5D side Scroller with Fast-paced action-adventure combat with Magic skills. Short clips to follow the adventure with plot and twists will be all along with the game.

name: Nightmare of Decay
description: A first-person action horror game set in a nightmarish manor infested with zombies, psychotic cultists, and a horde of other horrors. Utilize an assortment of different weapons in a brutal fight for survival as you try to escape from the Nightmare of Decay.

name: 白晓
description: A visual novel about friendship and promise. A high school girl encounters a mysterious white-haired girl, and the story begins...

name: Root: Exiles & Partisans & Vagabonds
description: Two classic expansions arrive in the wood! Three new Vagabonds are sneaking through the forest! Plus an all-new deck for an even wilder wood! Contains the Vagabond Pack & Exiles and Partisans Deck.

name: Super Nano Blaster
description: Super Nano Blaster is a shoot-em-up offering single-player and local co-op modes, that transports you to a retro-style digital universe. Delve into technology with your vessel and destroy anything that gets in your way!

name: Sifu: Vengeance Edition
description:
A third person action game featuring intense hand-to-hand combat, it puts you in control of a young Kung-Fu student on his path of revenge throughout the city.

The Vengeance Edition includes:

name: Loot River
description: Set in a series of procedurally generated labyrinths, Loot River is a dungeon crawling action roguelike that combines tense, real-time combat and dark fantasy settings with spatial block-shifting.

name: Bakery Simulator
description: Get up before dawn and see what it's like to be a baker! Learn to bake several dozen types of bread. Use realistic bakery machines. Deliver orders to stores, earn and invest. Use original recipes or experiment and create your own.

name: Age of Grit
description: A turn-based RPG set in a Wild West / Steampunk world

name: Brawl Stars: The Stuntshow
description: Sin descripción

name: ArduRogue
description:
A traditional roguelike for the Arduboy.
Retrieve the amulet of Yendor from the dungeon’s lowest level and return with it to the surface.

name: Castlevania: Aria of Sorrow - Magician Mode
description: Sin descripción

name: Never
description: NEVER uses mostly vanilla assets to create an atmosphere that I think you'll find unique and oppressive (but in a fun way). There is some old-school DEHACKED nonsense to keep it fresh.

name: Hydrosphere
description: It contains 6 very short maps that follow a theme inside a Hydroelectric plant. Gameplay is fairly easy and mostly consists of a power trip style.

name: Blue Orchid: Interactive Story
description: Blue Orchid is a narrative thriller/sci-fi mobile game, featuring chat messaging with NPCs, puzzles and investigation phases.

name: The Man From the Window
description:
Mama Rabbit returns home from work one late night.

Awake long past his bedtime, a frightened Junior Rabbit rushes in.

The book in his hands has very visibly spooked him, and Mama Rabbit tries convincing him that it's only a story.

But then a tap-tap-tapping begins on the window...

name: Filing Cistem
description: Filing Cistem is a game about putting things into boxes (or, more accurately, tubes). You work in a government office, where your job is to sort paperwork into "male" and "female" - all day, every day. Now get to work.

name: Duck Duck Swap
description: Are you a duck? Or a duck? Or a duck? Race against the clock to collect 10 slices of bread to feed yourself during winter! Swap ducks to unlock different abilities & get that bread!!

name: NASB: Nitro
description: This is a WIP mod that changes the behavior of some of the characters and mechanics in the game to give a faster, more explosive experience.

name: Super Corporate Tax Evader
description: The tax lawyer has come to subpoena your company. Shred all your incriminating documents so they have no basis to sue!

name: Fidget Spinner RPG
description:
Fidget spinner RPG is all about spinning a fidget spinner to absurd RPMs.
Along your journey you will level up skills such as mining, blacksmithing, and alchemy.
You will craft equipment to augment your stats and enhance your power.
You will achieve tasks & advance through a nonlinear progression.
You will buy and sell items of all sorts to NPC merchants.
And you will unlock talents that increase your capabilities in exciting ways.
All in the pursuit of more RPM.

name: Karolina
description: "Karolina" is a story-oriented game about a girl with a difficult fate.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Big Cats 2
description: Puzzles of spectacular Big Cats!

name: Mystery Solitaire: The Black Raven 3
description: Solitaire based on the mystical poem "The Raven".

name: 1001 Jigsaw: Castles and Palaces 3
description: The atmosphere of majestic palaces, fabulous fountains.

name: Acquitted
description: Piss bottles. Bats. Bike locks. Face the media-manufactured outrage of braindead mobs in a fully destructible, randomly generated riot zone as you try to get home from court alive after each self-defense trial. Shoot, hack, blast & build walls & turrets vs tricky AI in this brutally intense shooter!

name: Leviathan's Sword
description: It's a bullet hell rogue-lite with pirates, swords and a massive amount of treasure!

name: The Rusty Sword: Vanguard Island
description: The Rusty Sword: Vanguard Island is a short, top-down adventure game inspired by several 16-bit games.

name: Animals Collision
description: Animals Collision is a party game. Play as humanoid animal and fight for your victory: solo or online up to 4 players. There is no space for other animals on the arena!

name: Tuk Tuk Extreme Simulator
description: Have you ever drive a Tuk Tuk at max speed through the mountains and dangerous parts of the road?

name: Mini Mecum
description: Mini Mecum is an adventure walking simulator about existentialism, philosophy, and anxiety. Explore pretty and surreal locations as you try to understand what the heck I'm talking about.

name: It's Hard Being a Dog
description: IHBAD is a 2D roguelike, Hack N Slash platformer game where you play as a dog! Fight strange creatures and mighty mythical gods as you uncover your origin in this dark dystopian world.

name: Operation Pill
description: Operation Pill is the story of a small and brave pill that gets into your body and saves it from pathogenic bacteria. Arm yourself with an electrostatic shield and a germicidal cannon and save your body!

name: TacTac Prologue
description:
Puzzle-adventure game where you adopt the rol of Dunai, a young guy from Gaab. He's soon moving to the big city but before doing so he'll have to say goodbye to his loved ones. On his way he'll have to solve a desapearing case.

Explore the town of Gaab freely, you'll find all kind of colorful characters. Investigate the town to unveil the secrets that Gaab hides. Also the circus has arribed to town, go take a look at the attractions and the games it offers.

With a unique and original artistic style you'll fall in love with the scenaries and characters of the game. The game counts with two cases to solve and more than 20 different puzzles on the way that will make you rack your brains and are distributed all over Gaab.

Enjoy this prologue, this is just the beginning of a big story!

name: Rogue Door Defense
description: Rogue Door Defense is a tower defense mazing game with rouge-lite elements. Choose a door, defeat the enemies behind it and claim your unique reward. Build and upgrade different towers. Design your own maze to defend your lives against the attacking waves of monsters and powerful bosses.

name: Maze Workout: Western Lost Solo Car Racer
description: It's a retro western styled, maze racing game with 50 levels and 30 western style musics, find the checkpoints and laps to the next level.

name: The Price of Flesh
description: An immersive choose-your-own-adventure survival horror with optional adult content featuring hand drawn backgrounds, sprites, and over 150 pieces of full screen art- and 50 endings.

name: WTF Do You Know?
description: We just have one question for you... "WTF Do You Know?" I think it might be time for us to find out...

name: Blackout!!
description: Blackout!! is a Tower Defence Action-RPG where you must defend the land of Suwemba from the evil Olrinds! Select one of two heroes to fight back wave after wave of enemies by summoning defences while participating in the action-packed combat!

name: My Pet Rock
description: My Pet Rock is a collection of mini games inspired by early arcade games and modern endless runners. If you are looking for a fun, aesthetically pleasing and relatively casual game to play then My Pet Rock is for you. Come and customize your newest pet, while earning the highest scores around.

name: Into the Underdusk
description: A stagnant world slowly sinking into the depths of forgetfulness. You alone must brave this world on a quest to regain your lost locket and regain your memories before it's too late. Choose your path through an eery pixel art landscape, brave brutal precision-platforming gauntlets, meet strange denizens and grab collectibles to increase your powerset in a bid to regain your very soul.

name: SuperDungeon MegaCorp
description: Welcome to SuperDungeon MegaCorp, a puzzle game where you have to use your logic skills to tidy some huge dungeons full of monsters with unique abilities and personalities.

name: Cold House
description: Cold House is a co-op horror game for 1-4 people. You and your friends get into a car accident and are forced to hide from the cold in an abandoned house where it will soon turn out that they are not alone at all..

name: We Are Live
description: A pixelated turn-based JRPG Roguelite where you create your own spells which define how you approach combat. Collect items and craft spells to create your own class-based team of characters!

name: Pole
description: Pole is a NES style platformer. You use a pole (like a staff/stick) to play. Pole has tough to beat levels and a rewarding story.

name: Pick Pack Pup
description: Pick Pack Pup is a match-3 puzzle game where matches don't disappear immediately, making each new move trickier. In the game you play as Pup, the newest employee at a fulfillment center, who will discover the ups and downs of packing boxes and will unpack a lot of surprises along the way.

name: Lost Your Marbles
description: Lost Your Marbles is a charming visual novel where the roll of a marble makes all the difference. Join PROTA in this branching-narrative adventure as she makes her way through Pomegranate Village on a quest to find her lost dog MINTY and make it to the annual Festi-Ball before day's end.

name: Ships 3D
description:
Ships 3D is a .io style ships game with 2 Game modes: Team Flags and Trader. It has many aspects of progression including the Session Leaderboard (Shown in the top right while playing), WOF (Wall of Fame), and the Clan Leaderboard.

The game was made and developed by a solo indie developer known as Yp3d with contributions from Zorm.

name: Pikmin 2 Maps in Pikmin 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic the Hedgehog 2
description: Sonic the Hedgehog 2 is a promotional browser game by McDonald's in collaboration with Sega and Paramount based around the movie of the same name.

name: Dreamcatcher Apparatus
description: Dreamcatcher Apparatus is a short megawad for Doom 2. It is designed for limit removing source ports and made by various members of Doomer Boards led by 40oz.

name: Wicked Tuna
description:
Based on the popular reality TV show Wicked Tuna! Officially licensed!

Wicked Tuna is an arcade-style fishing game that uses the aesthetic and branding of the “Wicked Tuna” TV program to add a unique spin to the typical arcade fishing game.

name: Cat Gamer
description:
If you need to relax and your pet is bored, then this application will help you.
Open the world of games for your pet and go about your business or watch your cat get achievements.
In our collection of mini games, your pet will be able to find their favorite game for themselves.

name: Guess the Line
description: The game where AI judges your drawing skills.

name: Gasnator
description: You are hero super soldier Gasnator. Kill and destroy different enemies and find magic crystal in different areas.

name: Legend of Etad
description:
A first-person dungeon crawler for Playdate in the vein of classics such as Dungeon Master and Eye of the Beholder. Expect lots of environments to explore, enemies to defeat, weapons and items and magic to wield, and puzzles to solve!

Etad is an arcade adventure/exploration game crafted around the limitations of the Playdate. You won't get bothered with stats, inventory tetris or party management; instead expect pick-up-and-play hack'n'slash dungeon crawling with light puzzles and combat.

Every dungeon in Legend of Etad is unique and hand-crafted, with distinct art and game mechanics, and are linked together by outdoor "hub" areas. Each new area you discover will feel different from the last.

name: Hoosegow
description: Hoosegow is a dark comedy about survival and adventure in a prison. At the beginning you get character, a crime and a prison sentence. Your task is to make the right choices to survive. Live by the thieves' laws, keep your shank with you and trust no one.

name: People are Labyrinths
description: An investigation of the concept of labyrinths, mazes, emotional exploration, and mutual intimacy.

name: Knight of the Dead
description: In Knight of the Dead, the apocalypse is upon us. To run from the inevitable horde, one must consider their moves wisely, lest time, and the undead, catch up to them.

name: Life's Too Short
description:
In Life's Too Short, you take on the role of a celestial marriage councilor as you're tasked with repairing a rift between two vampires who have dramatically fallen out and confined themselves to their respective coffins...

You'll need to explore the mansion, meet various spooky characters and solve simple puzzles in order to put the mansion back together and mend the rift in the vampires' relationship!

name: Franken
description:
A new RPG from splendidland appears out of nowhere!

In "Franken", a hero fights monsters to become stronger so they can save the world.

name: Rock Paper Scissors: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade
description: Sin descripción

name: Evilmun Family: Season 4 Spark
description: Lightning season! The season will last from the beginning of May, new levels, new mechanics, new abilities, new friends!

name: Banana Shooter
description: In this game, you are not a banana, you are Dave, because you like to eat bananas, so the banana is taken away, the only way to get it is to kill other Dave. When you have the highest kill count, you will will get bananas. The whole game is a multiplayer battle type, you can configure your own gun or knife to fight against others. There are multiple maps in the game, you can get coins by killing enemies to upgrade, you can upgrade the movement speed, The upper limit of blood volume, but if you are accidentally killed, all upgrades will be cleared, which is a bit similar to roguelike, but it is a multiplayer battle type. And the map has a very hot back room recently, and my favorite strange core, which will definitely make your eyes shine.

name: Kryxivia
description:
Kryxivia is a fantasy 3D MMORPG game directly available on our website at kryxivia.io, a whole eco-system awaiting new adventurous players to collect Kryxit! In our world, prepare yourself to earn crypto-currency and unique rare NFT while having a fun and cooperative experience with your friends.

You can build your own character, fight in dungeons against bosses, stake your currency in the bank, loot from farming special items, cast spells contained from magical gems named Kryxit that can be linked to your items for accessibility.

name: TCG World Metaverse
description: TCG World is an online open world virtual gaming experience where players can earn TCG Coin 2.0, gather NFT collectibles, own virtual real estate, create, explore the game world, control their own online businesses, or just have fun. TCG World introduces a new approach to NFTs making it more than just a piece of art — now players can take their NFTs into the gaming world and play. Everything a player owns in the metaverse is an NFT — real estate, vehicles, pets, trophies and even player avatars.

name: Chloe Puzzle Game
description: Each level looks simple and playful with one motive: to get Chloe and Bunny to their red Targets; but the puzzles in them are unique and have a set of varying difficulties. The puzzles challenge your strategy, sokoban skills, experimenting how mechanical toys work, tactical thinking, improvising and much more. The difficulty increases with the level number and each level comes with 1 hint. Got stuck? Take the hint, find your way to the Target!

name: Cast Ashore
description: Aboard the Fusion Voyager rocket set for Mars, you find yourself in a state of panic as you scramble to save the mission from a complete disaster. Your efforts were unsuccessful and you are now the sole survivor of the crash which left you somewhere in the pacific ocean. Survive. Build. Explore.

name: Crossout: Polar Explorer
description: Sin descripción

name: NoLimits 2: Roller Coaster Simulation - Professional License
description: This Professional License DLC adds more features to the standard version of NoLimits 2.

name: Supersonic Mario
description: Supersonic Mario puts Mario from Super Mario 64 into Rocket League.

name: One Just Night
description:
Our Lady of Possibility (“Billie” for short) has always been frustrated with the vagueness of her prophecy. While those around her see endless potential, she feels stagnant and unable to move forward to become something great.

When The Seeing One, the oracle for the city, calls for Billie, Billie hopes to finally get clarity on her prophecy. Unfortunately, the new addition to her prophecy only serves to make things more complicated for Billie when the prophecy points at Seeker of a Just Night - the incredibly stern individual who Billie has clashed with in the past.

Just Night is reluctantly willing to give Billie the day to see if they can find common ground to make the prophecy come true - after all, who can argue with fate?

name: Only Furry 18+
description: Only Furry 18+ is a casual clicker adult game that looks like a popular social media.You should help main character to earn enough money to make a post. After every reached goal you will get a beautiful 3D picture or awesome 3D animation with girl.

name: Fog and Sea
description:
A remake of a Mini Jam 81 game of the same name.
You're from a place where the dead move to places built on or around giant creatures. speed date these creatures to find out where you'll wind up in the afterlife!

name: Idle Spiral
description: This is a beautiful "Idle", "Incremental" game based on spirals and mathematics. Your goal is to make the spiral grow farther and farther from the origin. The game is very simple, but it is very deep and can be enjoyed for a long time!

name: Cheesey Sponge
description: Do the right thing!

name: All in Love and War
description: Gunnery Sergeant Jayden Jones is grudgingly going through the motions of a brutal Marine life he can’t escape from when suddenly he finds himself at risk by the law for blossoming a relationship with his Sergeant Major, Walter Hardy. Under Marine Law, these two are forbidden to be together, so Jayden will have to bear great misfortune and find out what part of himself he’s really missing

name: Gamedle
description:
Gamedle is a game made for gamers, created by a single developer. Inspired by Wordle, Framed and the other spinoffs.

Guess the videogame by its cover, every day a new game.
You can also try the Unlimited mode to play non-stop.

name: Arruyo
description: Arruyo is a 3D first person terror game, where the player is inside a farmhouse with different monsters that will try to kill him/her. To survive and discover the mystery of that place, the player will have to hide from these monsters while investigating the farmhouse.

name: 100% Orange Juice: Shifu & Reika Character Pack
description: This Extra Character Pack for 100% Orange Juice adds 2 new playable characters from developer Orange_Juice - Shifu and Reika from the SUGURI series, as well as character and announcer voices for them, and a bonus kitten pet!

name: Double Jump NFT
description:
The first race-to-finish, P2E platform-royale game on the Solana Blockchain! Race against other Jumpers across the world in a medley of thrilling maps to finish first.

Pay $JUMP to enter global token tournaments for a chance to earn even more $JUMP! Jumper NFTs can be staked for $JUMP, which produce various amounts of daily tokens based on Jumper rarity. Participate in JumpDAO to vote on upcoming maps, new skins, entrance fees for token tournaments, and staking rewards!

name: Galactic Explorers
description: Galactic Explorers is a top-down 2D retro space shooter inspired by early games such as Galaxian, and Asteroids.

name: Saomi
description: Saomi is a little adventurer who likes challenges and exploring new places. In this adventure, Saomi sets out in search of a very rare diamond that was lost in an old family treasure.

name: Super Mario 64: Through the Ages
description: SM64: Through the Ages is a ROM hack/mod of Super Mario 64 developed by Kaze Emanuar. It was made using the Super Mario 64 Decompilation Project. In this game, Mario travels through stages inspired by historical locations or periods. Also, Mario can now be accompanied by different Pokémon, each one with a different special ability.

name: GnollHack
description: GnollHack is a NetHack variant that adds to the game animated graphics, spatial sounds, and voice overs, among other things. The current, modern version is available on Android and iOS. Old versions are available on Windows and Linux.

name: The Dreadful Space
description: A very action space war game, the mission is to fight the ships from other planets, the game requires a lot of skill to get rid of enemy shots and counterattack with all the cool features you can get in the game. The combat is intense and very agile, confronting your skills as a Battleship player.

name: Check it Out!
description: Ever dreamt of working a cash register with no pay or real-life customer interaction? Look no further! This simulation game brings a fresh-take to the notoriously dull tasks of customer service, introducing you to a cast of wacky characters and the baggage they carry.

name: Green Rabbit
description: Green Rabbit is a multi-activity NFT based game. Craft your armor through the use of NFTs to participate in a series of 3D activities, from socializing in the social hub Area, upgrading and decorating your apartment to participating in the fast-paced Ultra anima races, or Fighting for glory in Arena Anima.

name: Concordia: Digital Edition - Aegyptus & Creta
description: An official DLC to Concordia: Digital Edition adding two new maps - Aegyptus and Creta with their unique mechanics - all of which will add variety and new challenges to your games!

name: Echoes of Mana
description: Under the Mana Tree, all lore and legends shall gather. Echoes of Mana is a free-to-play action RPG in the Mana series. Echoes of Mana will feature an original story that weaves together both new and beloved Mana series characters alike. Players will be able to enjoy the action gameplay they love from the series, and battle with friends through a multiplayer mode.

name: Sick
description: Sick is a mixture of intense thriller and exploration of a small surrounding world. A first-person game with a frightening atmosphere. Once in Hell, you play as Jack Willis, who roams an endless loop of suffering, pain and fear.

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 1 - Episode 04
description: This DLC gives you access to Season 1 Episode 4: The Wreckfast Club! Cody and his friends teach Pizza Boy how to be cool in one of raddest spots in the city, East Hella Mall!

name: Medieval Sex Jigsaw
description: Enjoy this puzzle game with medieval sex.

name: The Secret Ingredient is...
description:
On his unyielding quest for employment, the MC picks up an odd job request at the townsboard from the local alchemist.

A straightforward, kinetic novel made with Ren'Py and a version of Skyrim SE, heavily modded for the creation of novels such as this one.
The game is not necessarily intended to take place in the world of The Elder Scrolls, so having played Skyrim is not required to understand the plot.
It features a few choices for dialogue variety but they do not alter the overall story, hence the kinetic novel tag.
It's primarily intended to be a one-shot story, with some light humor and romance elements.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Another Story
description:
This story expansion is exclusive to Season Pass 1.

Another Story provides the player a full look behind the curtain from another perspective featuring appearances from many characters who did not show up during the main story, including Ramlethal, May, and Baiken.

name: Apotris
description: A homebrew Tetris-like block stacking game for GameBoy Advance. Apotris features 11 game modes and the ability to edit the appearance of pieces in-game.

name: Dreams of a Lifetime
description: Dreams of a Lifetime is an action-adventure game played from both a third-person and first-person perspective. The Player must complete missions and micro-missions to progress through the game's story. In addition to missions, players can explore the game open world, among other things. The game consists of 14 levels, 2 of which are extra levels. New levels are unlocked as the player progresses through the story and correctly completes missions and micro-missions.

name: Deep Rock Galactic: Season 2 - Rival Escalation
description: Rivals are setting up new communications equipment, which must be shut down! In the all-new rival signal Season Event, you must interrupt the operation of the Rival Communications Router, hack its Antenna Nodes and shut it down before the timer runs out and the entire thing discharges a lethal energy blast! Timing and precision will be of the essence if you want to obtain the Data Cell stored inside the Router!

name: Super Nodage World
description: Super Nodage World is an online battle game where you can laugh with people from all over the world!

name: Polar Penguin Post
description: Penguin Delivery Service!! Run a logistics company in Winter Mountain, the land of snow! Place the items in the bag so that the penguins can deliver them safely. Do people's favors and gain trust. You can help the Pola Penguin Post settle and penguins become recognized as residents.

name: Warped Kart Racers
description: Get warped into the ultimate kart racing game - by yourself, or multiplayer - featuring the stars of 20th Television’s hit animated shows: American Dad!, Family Guy, King of the Hill and Solar Opposites! Experience iconic locations and even some surprise ones in your quest for karting glory!

name: You and Me
description: A short puzzle RPG-Maker Game made with washitape graphics. This was made in a week.

name: Fly & Poop
description: Dovy has been kidnapped! She was taken to the top of the highest skyscraper in the city. Now you, Chester, have to rescue her. To rescue her, you need to help the people in the city and use the rewards they give you to fix a ventilator so you can fly high enough. Help the people with simple pigeon activities... like delivering messages, helping out with a thing or two and of course... pooping on people and cars! Also, be aware of dangers like cars and the cat that is always patrolling the city. As they can give you some serious hits! But you got this, fly and poop little pigeon!

name: Party Bundle: Ludomania & Flowlines Vs. & 2048 Battles
description: Spark up your party with these three cooperative logic games!

name: Lumberhill: Strong Start Bundle
description: The package includes: Lumberhill + the Powerful People Pack.

name: Me and My Eldritch Parasite
description: You have an eldritch parasite. It sucks. Find a way to get rid of it while meeting its demands in this strage mix between sidescrolling horror, virutal pet and sarcasm.

name: Little Mouse's Encyclopedia + Brawl Chess
description: Explore the natural world while learning through play, then compete with your family in greatest game of all time - chess! A great game for little ones, Little Mouse's Encyclopedia comes bundled with Brawl Chess!

name: Gunlocked
description: A twin stick shooter without the twin stick, Gunlocked is a sci-fi action roguelike about careful positioning and upgrade selection. Manage unique targeting systems across multiple weapons and upgrades, as you battle legions of alien ships, and then do it all over again!

name: No Cat Fights Here
description: Let's avoid catfights on the roof? Draw a path for each cat to follow and keep them from bumping into each other along the way.

name: Soft Drift
description: Soft Drift is a Speed Based Car Drift Game with Simple and Soft Graphics.

name: Breakout Bricks
description:
Breakout come back in this modernized top-of-the-art version.

Enjoy hours of pure fun with this classic break the bricks game. Enjoy the enhanced version with today device capabilities and revive the gameplay simple yet addictive of first generation video-games.

Collectable power-ups; multi-balls, fireballs make this version like no others.

Show off your skills and complete the increasingly challenging levels.

It's time for you to break a few walls!

name: ABC Search With Me: Extended Edition
description: Discover new words and learn foreign languages in a fast, easy and fun way! Bundle includes the 'Extra Music Pack'.

name: Idle Business Tycoon: Build Simulator
description: Expand and grow! The possibilities are plenty in Idle Business Tycoon - Build Simulator Build. Earn money to unlock new establishments and expand your business all over town. The more you build, the more money you make!

name: Nonogram Minimal
description: Enjoy 200 hand-crafted puzzles, share and play user-made levels!
